categories: Category:Battles of the Emperor's ritual crisis

nodes.text: During the mission to stop the Sith Lord Fulminiss from unleashing a plague of madness across the planet Voss, the Jedi Knight known as the Hero of Tython undertook a mission to the Gormak city of Gorma-Koss in order to infiltrate the subterranean King's Hall and retrieve maps of the Nightmare Lands.
